name: pharokka

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
pharokka is a rapid standardised annotation pipeline for bacteriophage
genomes

dependencies.name: aragorn
dependencies.description:
ARAGORN, a program to detect tRNA genes and tmRNA genes in nucleotide
sequences.

dependencies.name: minced
dependencies.description:
MinCED is a program to find Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short
Palindromic Repeats (CRISPRs) in full genomes or environmental datasets
such as metagenomes, in which sequence size can be anywhere from 100 to
800 bp.

dependencies.name: mmseqs2
dependencies.description:
MMseqs2 (Many-against-Many sequence searching) is a software suite to
search and cluster huge protein and nucleotide sequence sets

dependencies.name: prodigal
dependencies.description: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes.

dependencies.name: py-bcbio-gff
dependencies.description: Read and write Generic Feature Format (GFF) with Biopython integration.

dependencies.name: py-biopython
dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-phanotate
dependencies.description:
PHANOTATE is a tool to annotate phage genomes. It uses the assumption
that non-coding bases in a phage genome is disadvantageous, and then
populates a weighted graph to find the optimal path through the six
frames of the DNA where open reading frames are beneficial paths, while
gaps and overlaps are penalized paths.

dependencies.name: trnascan-se
dependencies.description: Seaching for tRNA genes in genomic sequence
